Close to Kuala Lumpur heartbeat and the majestic KLCC Petronas Twin Tower, Shopping Paradise of Bukit Bintang and food and entertainment outlets in the Golden Triangle. All rooms are overlooking the majestic KLCC Twin Towers and the Titiwangsa lake. We offer hot water shower, AC and a well furnished clean room. The infinity pool overlooking the stunning view of KLCC and KL Tower and Kuala Lumpur panoramic view. As a safety percaution, all areas in the room are pre-disinfected before checking in.

The space
A amazing suite with a view, enjoy a full panoramic view of the KLCC Twin Towers and the KL skyline. Day or Night. Stylish decorated with a small private seated area to enjoy a good cup of coffee or tea.

Guest access
There are 2 Infinity pools here, located on Level 48 and Level 8.
Level 48 is the rooftop infinity pool and gym. There's a small entry fees of USD 4  per person for the pool and gym usage. Children under 12 years old are not allowed. Proper swimwear is needed.
Level 8 is the Garden view infinity pool and kids pool The pool entry fee is free of charge.
Both Level 48 infinity pool, Gym and Level 8 infinity pool opening hours are 8am till 10pm.

Other things to note
A great new place and a breath taking KLCC Twin Towers view and a stunning 360-degree KL view.
Places of Interest
1) KLCC Petronas Twin Towers - 3 Km
2) Bukit Bintang - 4 Km
3) Pavillion, Lot 10, Berjaya Times Square - 4 Km
4) Night Market Jalan Alor - 4 Km
5) Restaurants and Night Bars at Changkat Bukit Bintang - 4 Km
6) Dataran Merdeka (Independence Square) - 7 Km
7) Sultan Abdul Samad Building - 7 Km
8) China Town - 7 Km
9) Central Market - 8 Km
10) KL Tower - 7 Km
11) Botanical Garden - 8 Km
12) Birds Park - 8 Km
13) Batu Caves - 12 Km
14) Theon Hou Temple - 15 Km
15) Terminal Bus Station - 20 Km
15) Putrajaya - 30 Km
16) Genting Highland and Premium Outlet - 35 Km
17) KLIA 1 & KLIA 2 Airport - 60 Km

Our unit facing directly to KLCC View, where you can enjoy Kuala Lumpur View without any blockage. It is located beside Quill City Mall, where a monorail station (Medan Tuanku) just in front of the mall.

The space
Room 
- Queen size bed
- Wall mounted android television
- Attached bathroom with water heater
- Air conditioning
- Basic toiletries (ie, towels, shower gel, toilet papers)

Kitchenette
-  Basic (Light) cooking allowed 
-  Pots, pans, bowls, tableware & cutleries
-  Washing machine (detergent provided)
-  Refrigerator

Guest access
âœ Approximately 2KM driving distance to KLCC twin towers and Pavilion area
âœ Approximately 3KM driving distance to KL Tower
âœ Approximately 4KM driving distance to Chinatown
âœ 7 minutes walking distance to monorail station and Quill City Mall

** You may be interested also to hop on our GOKL City air-conditioned bus to explore the city, for FREE! Just walk to Medan Tuanku monorail station and buy a ticket & take the train to Chow Kit monorail station (or you may take a 6 minutes breeze walk to Chow Kit monorail station). 

The GOKL City buses stops by major touristsâ€™ attractions according to the routes, visit malaysia-traveller or more info.

In case of emergency :
âœ Approximately 2KM driving distance to Hospital Kuala Lumpur

Other things to note
Please take note that our unit is strictly a non-smoking unit. RM300.00 fine will be imposed for cleaning.

Max 2 persons only allow due to the unit only have 1 queen bed. NO EXTRA headcount allow.

Check in time: After 3:00 PM
Check out time: Before 12:00 PM

Our unit is a self-check-in/out unit. We will share all the check in details and guidelines through whats-app on your check in day. Kindly remember to drop us a message with your contact number with whats-app application

Take a dip in the rooftop infinity pool, work out in the gym, or relax in the sky lounge. Conveniently located near Bukit Bintang, KL Tower, and top dining spots â€” perfect for both work and relaxation.

The space

** FREE Wifi

Close to Kuala Lumpur heartbeat and the majestic KLCC Petronas Twin Tower, Shopping Paradise of Bukit Bintang and food and entertainment outlets in the Golden Triangle. All rooms are overlooking the majestic KLCC Twin Towers and the Titiwangsa lake. We offer hot water shower, AC and a well furnished clean room. The infinity pool overlooking the stunning view of KLCC and KL Tower and Kuala Lumpur panoramic view. As a safety precaution, all areas in the room are pre-disinfected before checking in.

The space
A fully furnished studio unit. A amazing suite with a view, enjoy a full panoramic view of the KLCC Twin Towers and the KL skyline. Day or Night. Stylish decorated with a small private seated area to enjoy a good cup of coffee or tea.

Guest access
There are 2 Infinity pools here, located on Level 48 and Level 8.
Level 48 is the rooftop infinity pool and gym. There's a small entry fees of USD 4  per person for the pool and gym usage. Children under 12 years old are not allowed. Proper swimwear is needed.
Level 8 is the Garden view infinity pool and kids pool The pool entry fee is free of charge.
Both Level 48 infinity pool, Gym and Level 8 infinity pool opening hours are 8am till 10pm.

Other things to note
A great new place and a breath taking KLCC Twin Towers view and a stunning 360-degree KL view at Level 48 Pool and Gym area.
